title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Improving Student Satisfaction in Synchronous Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary to intermediate mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Utilizing the cognitive, social, and teaching presences of the Community of Inquiry (COI) model, over 80% of students are actively engaged in the learning process
Through weekly PBL assignments, over 90% of learners improve their ability to apply mathematical concepts
Based on formative assessment data, over 75% of students rate their learning satisfaction at 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
